Package com.mygdx.othello.controllers

Class GameStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.othello.controllers.GameStateManager
  • public class GameStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the overall state of the game through a Stack of Screen and a GameData class it is the overall controller of the game that manages the saving, the screens and controllers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.Stack<AbstractScreen> abstractScreens
      Stack of AbstractScreen that the app renders on the screen

      GameData gameData
      Variable use to load/save the game data
      private com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json json
      This json file is used to store the game data while the app is terminated
      private static GameStateManager ourInstance
      Ensures that there is only one instance of GameStateManager
